name: Katamari Clone
description:
Synopsis

A Katamari inspired game. Roll up objects to grow larger and roll up everything in sight within the timelimit. The more you roll up the larger the objects you can pick up.

Controls

A/D Keys to rotate camera

W/S Keys to roll in a direction relative to where the camera is facing

Esc Key to pause

I do not own the music used in this game, all music used is temporary place holder and belongs to Namco Bandai sourced from the Katamari Damacy original soundtrack.

Known Bugs

In cases where nothing is moving or a red screen appears hit the Esc key to unpause. In this current build I have forgotten to renable time after selecting to back out of a menu after pausing.

Additionally on some computers this build fails to boot the player back to the main level select after finishing a level. If this occurs after hearing a jingle from the time completed or goal object rolled please press the Esc key and return to menu and load the level select from there.

These issues will be fixed relatively soon
